### 1. Is your feature request related to something you encountered in your project?* Please describe.

A clear and concise description of what the situation is. Ex. I'm always frustrated when..., I can't achieve...

### 2. Describe what would it look like ideally (with this new feature)*

A clear and concise description of what you want to happen. Ex. My code would look like this:...

### 3. Describe alternatives you've considered*

A clear and concise description of any alternative solutions or features you've considered 
+ Why they don't fit, what they are missing
